tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_feedback_surveys (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  feedback_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE FeedbackAnalytics (
  analytics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  feedback_score INT,
  feedback_topic VARCHAR(50),
  feedback_analyzed_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerFeedback(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedbackSurvey (
  survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  feedback TEXT,
  rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE SurveyResponses (
  response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  survey_id INT,
  question TEXT,
  answer TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerDetails (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  email TEXT,
  phone_number TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE FeedbackAnalysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  survey_id INT,
  analysis_date DATE,
  areas_for_improvement TEXT
)
